text: is a kind of Japanese confection or sweet food.Richie, Donald. (2005). The Japan Journals: 1947-2004, p. 66. Warabimochi is made of starch, sugar and water and used to be used roots of the "warabi" (one of the Japanese plants). People often eat it with kinako or anmitsu. ==References== ==Other websites== * Warabimochi * Homemade Warabimochi * 簡単モチモチわらびもち Category:Japanese food
title: Warabimochi
